name: Little Witch (cute_bunny_senpai_02)
description:
Shoutout to Adam Le Doux for making this possible with Bitsy! (https://ledoux.itch.io/)

You can brew a potion and feed your cat. Go to sleep to finish the game!

Tell me if there are mistakes in the code.

I made sountrack with Chrome Music Lab. It doesn't sync very nicely but that's the best I could do.
